articles.description: MEGHAN MARKLE has paid tribute to the 'inspirational' women behind a Grenfell Tower community kitchen on the third anniversary of the devastating fire which killed 72 people.

articles.author: Isobel Lewis
articles.title: RuPaul’s Drag Race Canada to air on BBC Three in July - The Independent
articles.description: Canadian spin-off series begins on 3 July
articles.content:
RuPauls Drag Race spin-off Canadas Drag Race is coming to BBC Three in July.
Following the success of the BBCs Drag Race UK, the first Canadian series of the competition show is set to air on BBC iP… [+1147 chars]

articles.author: Jessica Williams
articles.title: Piers Morgan: GMB star issues update on Kate Garraway’s husband: ‘She has been told’ - Express
articles.description: PIERS MORGAN, Good Morning Britain host alongside Susanna Reid, has opened up about the tragic ordeal his colleague Kate Garraway is going through with her husband Derek Draper, who was admitted to hospital in March after contracting coronavirus.

articles.author: Grace MacRae
articles.title: Royal tragedy: Princess Margaret's touching last words about the Queen revealed - Express
articles.description: PRINCESS Margaret died in the Queen's Golden Jubilee year of 2002 at the age of 71 after a period of ill health. However, her bond with her sister Queen Elizabeth II remained strong until her very final day.
